0101100111101101 1110100001101011 0 -> sum: 0100001001011000, cout: 1
0111000111110011 0010101011011001 1 -> sum: 1001110011001101, cout: 0
0111010001111100 1100000011111100 0 -> sum: 0011010101111000, cout: 1
